name: RoomClicker-DemoPrototype
description:
RoomClicker-DemoPrototype

This is the first published prototype for a point'n'click interactive narrative where the player clicks objects in the room to discover narrative clues and triggers occasional changes in the process.

As this is the first prototype, this is missing a lot of things like audio and menu functionalities. There are no branching triggers or narrative yet either. This prototype consists of the basic functionality of the game. The character is currently a placeholder and the graphics are not final.

Use mouse to click in the game. No other controls needed.

This prototype was made as part of Centria Game Lab of Spring 2022.
